name: Instant Pot® Butter Pecan Oatmeal
author: thedailygourmet
summary: Oatmeal is such a great breakfast food, customizable to suit each person's palate. The shining stars in this breakfast dish are of course the pecans, and a butter pecan-flavored coffee creamer.
directions: Pour 1 cup water into a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Combine oats, remaining water, coffee creamer, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon sugar, and salt in a small heat resistant bowl
Select porridge setting according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 5 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Meanwhile, melt butter in a skillet over medium-high heat
Add pecans and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar
Allow butter to brown and nuts to toast, about 1 minute depending on size of pecan pieces
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 12 minutes
Release remaining pressure carefully using the quick-release method, about 5 minutes
Spoon oatmeal into 2 bowls and top with equal amounts of toasted pecans
